title: Bestlite Style Wall Lamp - BL7 Black
body: Possessing the contemporary look and celebration of clean lines of Bauhaus, the Mobelaris style of Bestlite Style Wall Lamp - BL7 designed by Robert Dudley Best in 1930 is one of the many Bestlite lamps that has proved a great success and was proclaimed the first Bauhaus manifestation in the UK by the leading British publication Architects Journal. This is the wall mounted version of the iconic BestLite made famous when Winston Churchill had one standing on his desk.
